lizzy-chat.title: 4C:me
lizzy-chat.description: Chat with 4C:me, our AI assistant, to get answers to your questions and help you with your projects.

lizzy-transcription.title: 4C:me Transcription
lizzy-transcription.description: Transcribe and edit your client interviews and assign names to speakers - all within a 4C secure environment and free of charge.

welcome_message:
Hi, I am 4C:me.
How can I help you today?
chat_prompt: Send a message or question to 4C:me...
chat_secure_message: All chats are confidential. Your data stays within 4C's secure Azure EU infrastructure and is never shared externally.
